name: Bloomerang
tooltip: Hits up to three targets in its lane, twice

name: Iceberg Lettuce
tooltip: Freezes zombies that step on it, and extinguishes flames

name: Grave Buster
tooltip: Plant it on a grave to remove the grave

name: Bonk Choy
tooltip: Rapidly punches enemies ahead or behind

name: Repeater
tooltip: Shoots two peas at the enemy

name: Twin Sunflower
tooltip: Gives twice as much sun as a sunflower

name: Snow Pea
tooltip: Shoots frozen peas that damage and slow zombies
